data.title: symbol
data.meta_description: SYMBOL translations: símbolo, símbolo, símbolo [masculine], símbolo [masculine]. Learn more in the Cambridge English-Portuguese Dictionary.
data.text:
noun [ C ]

uk

Your browser doesn't support HTML5 audio

/ˈsɪm.bəl/ us

Your browser doesn't support HTML5 audio

/ˈsɪm.bəl/

More examplesFewer examples

For many people the horseshoe is a symbol of good luck.

The Berlin Wall was a potent symbol of the Cold War.

The red cross symbol was painted on each side of the vehicle.

He described sport as a symbol of peace and a means of promoting fraternity between nations.

The symbol © shows that something is protected by copyright.

(Translation of symbol from the Cambridge English-Portuguese Dictionary © Cambridge University Press)

Translation of symbol | GLOBAL English–Portuguese Dictionary

symbol

noun [ countable ]

/ˈsɪmbəl/

sb or sth that represents a quality or idea

símbolo [ masculine ]

He became a symbol of freedom in his country. Ele se tornou um símbolo da liberdade em seu país.

a mark that has a particular meaning

símbolo [ masculine ]

chemical symbols símbolos químicos

The symbol ≤ is used to mean “less than or equal to.” O símbolo ≤ é usado para dizer “menor ou igual a.”

(Translation of symbol from the GLOBAL English-Portuguese Dictionary © 2021 K Dictionaries Ltd)

Examples of symbol

symbol

His flowing graphism is not only an elegant record of the physical movement of the artist's hand, but a symbol of the motion of atoms.

There are differences in the forms of the fifth, sixth, seventh, and eighth symbols.

The elemental nature of the musical note facilitates its specification using abstract symbols.

Those artifacts include language, logic, mathematics, graphics, symbols, and various tools and devices, whether mechanical or electronic.

The grey area surrounded by a symbol shows the allowable range for the control points to stay within the designated vehicle class.

We also assume that the code of syntactic objects (such as type statements and type derivations) is elementary in the number of symbol-occurrences therein.

Contributions of the visual components of oral symbols to speech comprehension.

Algorithmic aesthetics are developed based on the aesthetic measure theory, surveys of human preferences, and popular long-lasting symbols.

These examples are from corpora and from sources on the web. Any opinions in the examples do not represent the opinion of the Cambridge Dictionary editors or of Cambridge University Press or its licensors.

B2

left luggage
